entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`itemId` TEXT NOT NULL, `itemAddName` TEXT NOT NULL, `catId` TEXT NOT NULL, `userId` TEXT NOT NULL, `storeId` TEXT NOT NULL, `catName` TEXT NOT NULL, `subCatId` TEXT NOT NULL, `subCatName` TEXT NOT NULL, `entryType` TEXT NOT NULL, `quantity` INTEGER NOT NULL, `gsWt` REAL NOT NULL, `ntWt` REAL NOT NULL, `fnWt` REAL NOT NULL, `purity` TEXT NOT NULL, `crgType` TEXT NOT NULL, `crg` REAL NOT NULL, `othCrgDes` TEXT NOT NULL, `othCrg` REAL NOT NULL, `cgst` REAL NOT NULL, `sgst` REAL NOT NULL, `igst` REAL NOT NULL, `huid` TEXT NOT NULL, `unit` TEXT NOT NULL, `addDesKey` TEXT NOT NULL, `addDesValue` TEXT NOT NULL, `addDate` INTEGER NOT NULL, `modifiedDate` INTEGER NOT NULL, `sellerFirmId` TEXT NOT NULL, `purchaseOrderId` TEXT NOT NULL, `purchaseItemId` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`itemId`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`catId` TEXT NOT NULL, `catName` TEXT NOT NULL, `gsWt` REAL NOT NULL, `fnWt` REAL NOT NULL, `userId` TEXT NOT NULL, `storeId` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`catId`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`subCatId` TEXT NOT NULL, `catId` TEXT NOT NULL, `userId` TEXT NOT NULL, `storeId` TEXT NOT NULL, `catName` TEXT NOT NULL, `subCatName` TEXT NOT NULL, `quantity` INTEGER NOT NULL, `gsWt` REAL NOT NULL, `fnWt` REAL NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`subCatId`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`storeId` TEXT NOT NULL, `userId` TEXT NOT NULL, `proprietor` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `email` TEXT NOT NULL, `phone` TEXT NOT NULL, `address` TEXT NOT NULL, `registrationNo` TEXT NOT NULL, `gstinNo` TEXT NOT NULL, `panNo` TEXT NOT NULL, `image` TEXT NOT NULL, `invoiceNo` INTEGER NOT NULL, `upiId` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`storeId`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`userId` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `email` TEXT, `mobileNo` TEXT NOT NULL, `token` TEXT, `pin` TEXT, `role` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`userId`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`userId` TEXT NOT NULL, `aadhaarNumber` TEXT, `address` TEXT, `emergencyContactPerson` TEXT, `emergencyContactNumber` TEXT, `governmentIdNumber` TEXT, `governmentIdType` TEXT, `dateOfBirth` TEXT, `bloodGroup` TEXT, `isActive` INTEGER NOT NULL, `createdAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updatedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`userId`), FOREIGN KEY(`userId`) REFERENCES `users`(`userId`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`mobileNo` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `address` TEXT, `gstin_pan` TEXT, `addDate` INTEGER NOT NULL, `lastModifiedDate` INTEGER NOT NULL, `totalItemBought` INTEGER NOT NULL, `totalAmount` REAL NOT NULL, `notes` TEXT, `userId` TEXT NOT NULL, `storeId` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`mobileNo`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`khataBookId` TEXT NOT NULL, `customerMobile` TEXT NOT NULL, `planName` TEXT NOT NULL, `startDate` INTEGER NOT NULL, `endDate` INTEGER NOT NULL, `monthlyAmount` REAL NOT NULL, `totalMonths` INTEGER NOT NULL, `totalAmount` REAL NOT NULL, `status` TEXT NOT NULL, `notes` TEXT, `userId` TEXT NOT NULL, `storeId` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`khataBookId`), FOREIGN KEY(`customerMobile`) REFERENCES `customer`(`mobileNo`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`transactionId` TEXT NOT NULL, `customerMobile` TEXT NOT NULL, `transactionDate` INTEGER NOT NULL, `amount` REAL NOT NULL, `transactionType` TEXT NOT NULL, `category` TEXT NOT NULL, `description` TEXT, `referenceNumber` TEXT, `paymentMethod` TEXT, `khataBookId` TEXT, `monthNumber` INTEGER, `notes` TEXT, `userId` TEXT NOT NULL, `storeId` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`transactionId`), FOREIGN KEY(`customerMobile`) REFERENCES `customer`(`mobileNo`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE , FOREIGN KEY(`khataBookId`) REFERENCES `customer_khata_book`(`khataBookId`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`orderId` TEXT NOT NULL, `customerMobile` TEXT NOT NULL, `storeId` TEXT NOT NULL, `userId` TEXT NOT NULL, `orderDate` INTEGER NOT NULL, `totalAmount` REAL NOT NULL, `totalTax` REAL NOT NULL, `totalCharge` REAL NOT NULL, `discount` REAL NOT NULL, `note` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(`orderId`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`orderItemId` TEXT NOT NULL, `orderId` TEXT NOT NULL, `orderDate` INTEGER NOT NULL, `itemId` TEXT NOT NULL, `customerMobile` TEXT NOT NULL, `catId` TEXT NOT NULL, `catName` TEXT NOT NULL, `itemAddName` TEXT NOT NULL, `subCatId` TEXT NOT NULL, `subCatName` TEXT NOT NULL, `entryType` TEXT NOT NULL, `quantity` INTEGER NOT NULL, `gsWt` REAL NOT NULL, `ntWt` REAL NOT NULL, `fnWt` REAL NOT NULL, `fnMetalPrice` REAL NOT NULL, `purity` TEXT NOT NULL, `crgType` TEXT NOT NULL, `crg` REAL NOT NULL, `othCrgDes` TEXT NOT NULL, `othCrg` REAL NOT NULL, `cgst` REAL NOT NULL, `sgst` REAL NOT NULL, `igst` REAL NOT NULL, `huid` TEXT NOT NULL, `addDesKey` TEXT NOT NULL, `addDesValue` TEXT NOT NULL, `price` REAL NOT NULL, `charge` REAL NOT NULL, `tax` REAL NOT NULL, `sellerFirmId` TEXT NOT NULL, `purchaseOrderId` TEXT NOT NULL, `purchaseItemId` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`orderItemId`), FOREIGN KEY(`orderId`) REFERENCES `order`(`orderId`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`exchangeItemId` TEXT NOT NULL, `orderId` TEXT NOT NULL, `orderDate` INTEGER NOT NULL, `customerMobile` TEXT NOT NULL, `metalType` TEXT NOT NULL, `purity` TEXT NOT NULL, `grossWeight` REAL NOT NULL, `fineWeight` REAL NOT NULL, `price` REAL NOT NULL, `isExchangedByMetal` INTEGER NOT NULL, `exchangeValue` REAL NOT NULL, `addDate` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`exchangeItemId`), FOREIGN KEY(`orderId`) REFERENCES `order`(`orderId`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`firmId` TEXT NOT NULL, `firmName` TEXT NOT NULL, `firmMobileNumber` TEXT NOT NULL, `gstNumber` TEXT NOT NULL, `address` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`firmId`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`sellerId` TEXT NOT NULL, `firmId` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `mobileNumber` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`sellerId`), FOREIGN KEY(`firmId`) REFERENCES `firm`(`firmId`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_seller_firmId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_seller_firmId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`firmId`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`purchaseOrderId` TEXT NOT NULL, `sellerId` TEXT NOT NULL, `billNo` TEXT NOT NULL, `billDate` TEXT NOT NULL, `entryDate` TEXT NOT NULL, `extraChargeDescription` TEXT, `extraCharge` REAL, `totalFinalWeight` REAL, `totalFinalAmount` REAL, `notes` TEXT, `cgstPercent` REAL NOT NULL, `sgstPercent` REAL NOT NULL, `igstPercent` REAL NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`purchaseOrderId`), FOREIGN KEY(`sellerId`) REFERENCES `seller`(`sellerId`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_purchase_order_sellerId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_purchase_order_sellerId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`sellerId`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`purchaseItemId` TEXT NOT NULL, `purchaseOrderId` TEXT NOT NULL, `catId` TEXT NOT NULL, `catName` TEXT NOT NULL, `subCatId` TEXT NOT NULL, `subCatName` TEXT NOT NULL, `gsWt` REAL NOT NULL, `purity` TEXT NOT NULL, `ntWt` REAL NOT NULL, `fnWt` REAL NOT NULL, `fnRate` REAL NOT NULL, `wastagePercent` REAL NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`purchaseItemId`), FOREIGN KEY(`purchaseOrderId`) REFERENCES `purchase_order`(`purchaseOrderId`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_purchase_order_item_purchaseOrderId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_purchase_order_item_purchaseOrderId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`purchaseOrderId`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`exchangeId` TEXT NOT NULL, `purchaseOrderId` TEXT NOT NULL, `catId` TEXT NOT NULL, `catName` TEXT NOT NULL, `subCatId` TEXT NOT NULL, `subCatName` TEXT NOT NULL, `fnWeight` REAL NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`exchangeId`), FOREIGN KEY(`purchaseOrderId`) REFERENCES `purchase_order`(`purchaseOrderId`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_metal_exchange_purchaseOrderId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_metal_exchange_purchaseOrderId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`purchaseOrderId`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`address` TEXT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT, `method` TEXT NOT NULL, `isDefault` INTEGER NOT NULL, `lastConnectedAt` INTEGER, `supportedLanguages` TEXT, `currentLanguage` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(`address`))
